title: ECGEL: a multimodal 12-lead ECG classification model for heart failure prediction
details: X Liang, N Jiang, P Qi, Z Chen, J Tong, S Xia - Biomedical Engineering Letters, 2025
abstract: Cardiovascular diseases (CVD) are the leading cause of death worldwide, with heart failure (HF) being one of the most fatal conditions within CVD, greatly impacting patients' quality of life and imposing a heavy socioeconomic burden. Early …
